analysis.description:
Detected issues with version pragma in /unique_contracts/0xcc4bb7948ac97b0dd8857552a69893cd0f03ee17.sol:
	- pragma solidity^0.4.19 (/unique_contracts/0xcc4bb7948ac97b0dd8857552a69893cd0f03ee17.sol#1): it allows old versions
Parameter '_owner' of Frikandel.balanceOf (/unique_contracts/0xcc4bb7948ac97b0dd8857552a69893cd0f03ee17.sol#19) is not in mixedCase
Parameter '_to' of Frikandel.transfer (/unique_contracts/0xcc4bb7948ac97b0dd8857552a69893cd0f03ee17.sol#40) is not in mixedCase
Parameter '_value' of Frikandel.transfer (/unique_contracts/0xcc4bb7948ac97b0dd8857552a69893cd0f03ee17.sol#40-41) is not in mixedCase
Parameter '_from' of Frikandel.transferFrom (/unique_contracts/0xcc4bb7948ac97b0dd8857552a69893cd0f03ee17.sol#59) is not in mixedCase
Parameter '_to' of Frikandel.transferFrom (/unique_contracts/0xcc4bb7948ac97b0dd8857552a69893cd0f03ee17.sol#59-60) is not in mixedCase
Parameter '_value' of Frikandel.transferFrom (/unique_contracts/0xcc4bb7948ac97b0dd8857552a69893cd0f03ee17.sol#60) is not in mixedCase
Parameter '_spender' of Frikandel.approve (/unique_contracts/0xcc4bb7948ac97b0dd8857552a69893cd0f03ee17.sol#83) is not in mixedCase
Parameter '_value' of Frikandel.approve (/unique_contracts/0xcc4bb7948ac97b0dd8857552a69893cd0f03ee17.sol#83) is not in mixedCase
Parameter '_owner' of Frikandel.allowance (/unique_contracts/0xcc4bb7948ac97b0dd8857552a69893cd0f03ee17.sol#92) is not in mixedCase
Parameter '_spender' of Frikandel.allowance (/unique_contracts/0xcc4bb7948ac97b0dd8857552a69893cd0f03ee17.sol#92-95) is not in mixedCase
